narrative:
No non-compliant items were identified during this Pre-License inspection. 
 
This is a 1st Pre-License Inspection for a Class “C” license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the 
applicant. The applicant is ready to be licensed under the AWA. 
 
This site is determined to be in compliance. 
All sites used for regulated activity must demonstrate full compliance with the Animal Welfare Act prior to issuance of a 
license. 
A copy of your license will be sent to you without any additional action on your part once all sites are determined to be in 
compliance.
